Chrysler, which popularized minivans in 1983 under former CEO Lee Iacocca , will`` rethink'' the minivan to make it more versatile, Sergio Marchionne said. We're not going to give one inch of territory in terms of our domination of( the minivan) segment, Sergio Marchionne told workers at the Windsor Assembly Plant, where the Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town& Country minivans are made.
